In this Leadership Compass, we examine the market segment, vendor service functionality, relative market share, and innovative approaches to providing SASE Integration solutions.

relatedBlades.copy:
KuppingerCole Leadership Compass for SASE Integration Suites, 2023

Cloudflare Named an Overall Leader

![[ACQ] Q1'23 WEB - GBL - KuppingerCole Leadership Compass for SASE - image](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/7dzJJXTEVKheVZ1ctFWJdW/7a38b6ac6302529cfd861bc4f20eb37f/KuppingerCole_LC_for_SASE_chart.png) As organizations continue to investigate a Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) architecture to converge security and network capabilities in the cloud, the market itself has become difficult to navigate especially as it continually evolves. Through its SASE market analysis, KuppingerCole Analysts AG cited several Cloudflare strengths such as our: - Large globally distributed presence and sophisticated traffic acceleration - Massive backbone capacity - 100% uptime guarantee - Encrypted Traffic Analysis for security - Innovative Remote Browser Isolation built on Network Vector Rendering technology - Freemium model for SMBs under 50 seats See why KuppingerCole analysts rank Cloudflare as a Leader for SASE Integration Suites. We believe our deployment simplicity, network resiliency, and innovation velocity helped contribute to our ranking. At Cloudflare, we think our Internet-native architecture sets us apart as the easiest path to Zero Trust, SASE, and beyond. Read the full report for a detailed analysis of the SASE market and the 10 included vendors.
